item.title: The ‘Kardashian Kurse’ and a Jurassic Park reunion are among the Super Bowl commercials planned for this year
item.description: Space sold for an average of $8 million per 30-second unit, but a handful of spots sold for $10 million-plus, a record, said NBC VP Peter Lazarus.

item.title: Americans are so broke and housing is so expensive that ‘rent now, pay later’ is on the rise
item.description: Companies such as Flex, Livble and, more recently, Affirm, say breaking rent into multiple payments can help renters manage cash flow. Beware, experts...

item.title: Something broke in the economy in 2023 that explains why so many people are miserable about it, New York Fed says
item.description: Higher-income Americans and those with college degrees have ramped up their spending more quickly in the past three years than other consumers.

item.title: Trump hit with $16 billion lawsuit for move to cripple New York metro area rail tunnel
item.description: “Allowing this project to stop would put one of the country’s most heavily used transit corridors at risk,” New York AG Letitia James said.

item.title: JD Vance appeals to allies for new ‘trading bloc’ that keeps Trump’s tariffs in place, secures access to rare earths
item.description: “We don’t want to ever go through what we went through a year ago,” Trump said on Monday when announcing Project Vault.
